channel.title: Sample Document on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Sample Document on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: Headings # Heading level 1 ## Heading level 2 ### Heading level 3 #### Heading level 4 ##### Heading level 5 ###### Heading level 6 Emphasis *Italic* **Bold** ~~Strikethrough~~ Horizontal Rule --- Lists Unordered Lists - First item - Second item - Third item - Fourth item or * First item * Second item * Third item * Fourth item Ordered Lists 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item 4.

item.title: Build-in Shortcodes
item.description: See https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#use-hugos-built-in-shortcodes figure 2 People Sitting With View of Yellow Flowers during Daytime gist highlight <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Data.Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> tweet Hugo 0.24 Released: Big archetype update + @Netlify _redirects etc. file supporthttps://t.co/X94FmYDEZJ #gohugo #golang @spf13 @bepsays — GoHugo.io (@GoHugoIO) June 21, 2017 vimeo youtube

item.title: Custom Shortcodes
item.description: Code highlight with clipboard sample/custom-shortcodes.html Copy {{< highlight html >}} <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> {{< /highlight >}} Alert panel Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. item.title: Table of Contents
item.description: Note The TableOfContents field with true in your contentâ€™s front matter will render a table of contents. TableOfContents: true Setting the built-in .TableOfContents variables can configure what heading levels you want to include in TOC. item.title: Search Shortcode
item.description: Note Search Shortcode powered by Algolia You can create a search page just by adding search shortcode.
